useCase.name: Update Component Name

preconditions.precondition: Repository Manager is logged into the system

useCase.trigger: User wants to update a component's name

mainSequence.step: Repository Manager accesses the component update form
DIMS Interface requests current component details
Component Management System queries DIMS Database for current component information
DIMS Database returns component information to Component Management System
Component Management System displays current component information
Repository Manager inputs new component name
DIMS Interface validates new name and prepares update
Component Management System updates component name in DIMS Database
Component Management System confirms the update to Repository Manager
Repository Manager receives and views the update confirmation
